data.title: Value and Fresh Ingrediants!
data.text: Always fresh and friendly staff, you cant beat Taco Tuesday, large portions at this location always!  and the dollar up for a Draft Beer is great!!  Fun atmosphere and great outdoors seating

data.title: Grandkids pick
data.text: Very fast food feeling and very small,portions, wouldn't go back.  A bit pricey for what we ate, but anything for the grandkids

data.title: Excellent food and service
data.text:
I use to go the Flatts in Lake Worth, but the Boynton location actually is better. I would think that with a chain like this, they all would be the same. But they're not. This location is way better. Everything tastes fresh, particularly the guacamole. Service is very friendly. We eat here at least once a month.  
The questions ask if there are waiters and waitresses, and asks if it is fast food, so to clarify... I said yes to fast food and yes to wait staff... you order your food at a walk up counter, pay at the counter and can sit where ever you like. But a waitstaff will bring you your food and check on you, refill your drinks, ect. Food come pretty quickly. So, it's kinda like a higher quality fast food place, lol.

data.title: Cool taco joint with a kick
data.text: The food was really good. Got to talk to the manager who gave us the background on the place and showed us a few great hot sauces to try which was a cool extra. Great prices and good food. Not a bad place for a quick lunch or dinner

data.title: Where's the MEAT???
data.text:
Ordered dos beef tacos, service was fast but I returned my food due to lack of meat and tons of lettuce! John offered to "ADD MORE MEAT" or replace the order, told them no, just refund the money. Music to loud to carry a conversation, asked for it to be turned down so I could talk to my wife while she ate. Needless to say I wasn't the only one w this problem yet they didn't turn it down. 
 Nice try but a Mexican place that charges for chips n salsa is not a place I want to eat!

data.title: Tasty and very filling
data.text: This is one of my son's favorite places to eat. The food is very filling and the portions are BIG. I always have an amusing time checking out all the creative ceiling tiles and I love the sauce bar with all the varieties. The staff is great and the service is swift. In good weather you can even sit out on the patio and watch the world go by.

data.title: Great food! Great deal! Great staff!
data.text:
Big burritos and tacos! The Tuesday and Thursday specials don't get much better! For so little money you walk out completely stuffed! Guacamole is really good, too!
Phil is a terrific manager and always makes sure we are happy every time we're there. He even helped me jump start my car one night. I can tell he appreciates the customers and Tijuana Flats is very blessed to have Phil. Christian, the shift manager is just awesome! He works his butt off, serving, cleaning, greeting the customers and still has time to always stop by our table to personally greet us and chat with us. My son just loves him and you couldn't find a better or more dedicated staff member than Christian! And keep the turkey meat!! It's so good and tasty!!!! LOVE IT!!

data.title: Great selection of sauces
data.text:
We like to stop by here for a burrito when we are in town. 
They have a sauce bar with a variety of sauces with different tastes and heat levels.
I only wish I had asked for a plain salsa to have with the chips that came with my burrito.

data.title: Quick and Easy
data.text: Exactly what we expected from Tijuana Flats. However the manager went above and beyond, gave us free beans and rice to try. Staff is super nice and very attentive, nice location.

data.title: Quick and cheap lunch
data.text:
One of my favorite quick stop lunches. It is very good Mexican Food and service is excellent. They take very good care of their customers. This is just down the street from where I work so it's a great place for a quick lunch. Taco Tuesdays are awesome you get two tacos, chips and salsa and a drink for $5.99. Everything is fresh and everything is tasty. 
Very clean and great service.

data.title: Great fresh salsa, good food, and great service!
data.text:
We initially walked in and thought we'd try some appetizers. We quickly became hungry after trying the fresh salsa and chips. The service was awesome as our server gave great recommendations based on our first time being there. (They continued to impress with the customizable meals. Split our order in two so we could share.) If you prefer spicy - We had the No-ritto bowl and it had a kick to it! 
Hoping we get a Tijuana Flats on the west coast soon!

data.title: The place to go, often and again!
data.text:
Normally I avoid chain restaurants like the plague, but my wife and I were out lat one night and we stopped by Tiajuana Flats.  The place exudes a chick dive atmosphere, the ordering is simple tex mex fair, all reasonably priced (go for the steak chimi, you won't be disappointed).  Add to all of that the multitude of hot sauces (varying degrees of hot from sweet to never again...not me, my wife) and I found a place I will go to again and again.
If you go, corner of Old Boynton and Congress, look over the hot sauce bar, the 3D tile with the hot sauce bottle and baby iguana, I made that as part of a contest for the restaurant.....
I Love this place, and I am pretty sure you will too,

data.title: We LOVE Tijuana Flats!
data.text: Great, affordable food with an amazing sauce bar. Employees are friendly and fun yet still get their job done (drinks are refilled, everything is clean). The manager is awesome and very much cares about his store (we overheard him giving employee reviews on one quiet Sunday afternoon). Tijuana goes above and beyond!

data.title: Great and fresh!
data.text: Love this location, nice staff. The food is always good. We even like to order online and take it to go. Love the hot sauce bar.

data.title: Terrible food!
data.text: Just decided to try a burrito from this new place today, what a stupid decision! Food was terrible, tasted like from a week ago! They don't know what a burrito should taste like for sure, Won't be going back that again for sure!

data.title: Flautas
data.text: I tried the flautas with blackened chicken and they were pretty tasty. The blackened chicken was the best part; the flour tortilla portion of the flauta was crispy, but a little bitter by itself. I also enjoyed the nachos. On the other hand, I did not enjoy the carnitas. The flavor was a little strange and grainy. I tried it in my boyfriends tacos and chimichanga, which I am sure would be better with another meat filling. The manager can be a little pushy when it comes to ordering and I do not like that at all.

data.title: Great service and yummy food
data.text:
Was invited to come to their Grand Opening event.  Pretty much I can order whatever I want from the menu, complimentary.  So lucky I received the invitation!
Since its their first day, I understand many employees are still training and they're trying to get used to a lot of things.  But from their super positive attitude that day, I know they will do great!  Everything was great except the girl (short and thin) that was training the cashier can use a little more smile. She looks miserable to be there.  Looking forward to return to this location soon since I live nearby.

data.title: Grandes Tacos en Precios Bajos
data.text: Enormes Tacos vienen con chips de tortilla y selección de salsas calientes. Sirven cerveza fría y delicioso té dulce. Servicio rápido con camareras lindo. Gran restaurante para llevar comida o comida rápida. Recomendado!
